line-9: To work as an integral member of the Capital Delivery Eastern (CDE) assurance team, working with the team to identify and carry out assurance activities on the trends the team find. Proactively plan assurance activities to meet the relevant elements of governance and the assurance needs of CDE to improve business performance, in coordination with other members of the team as the need arises.  This role will work in a small team leading all aspects of the assurance activities of CDE, including but not limited to, carrying out assurance activities on suppliers and the internal delivery teams activities, working with suppliers on periodic self-assurance submissions, assessing the internal teams against the ORR RM3 model, and working on improvements in the way we conduct all assurance activities within CDE.
